title: Buffalo shooting: Ten dead in racially motivated attack at New York state store
description: An 18-year-old is charged over the New York state attack, which is being investigated as a racial hate crime.

title: Buffalo shooting: 'Bodies were everywhere'
description: Eyewitnesses describe shock and disbelief after a gunman shot 10 people dead in New York state.

title: Ukraine war: Finland confirms Nato bid despite Putin warning
description: President Niinisto called the move - a response to Russia invading Ukraine - a "historic day".

title: Eurovision 2022: Ukraine wins, while the UK's Sam Ryder comes second
description: Ukraine's Kalush Orchestra triumphs, while Sam Ryder gives the UK its best result since 1998.

title: Eurovision win brings 'incredible happiness' to Ukraine
description: Public support helped push Kalush Orchestra and their song Stefania on to win with 631 points.

title: Somalia's presidential election: Where just 329 people vote
description: Only MPs, voting in a heavily fortified zone, will decide on who will lead the troubled country.

title: Saudi Aramco: Oil giant sees profits jump as prices surge
description: The state-owned Saudi Aramco is currently the world's most valuable company due to soaring oil prices.

title: Kenya elections 2022: William Ruto picks Rigathi Gachagua as running mate
description: William Ruto, a frontrunner in this year's presidential election, picks businessman Rigathi Gachagua.

title: Abortion rights rallies held around the US
description: Pro-choice supporters are concerned that the Supreme Court could overturn the legal right to abortion.

title: Delhi office fire: Dozens killed as fire sweeps through building
description: Most of those inside were women, leaving families frantically searching for news of their fate.

title: Shireen Abu Aqla: UN condemns killing of Al Jazeera reporter
description: Shireen Abu Aqla was shot dead in disputed circumstances in the occupied West Bank.

title: Afghanistan face veil decree: 'It feels like being a woman is a crime'
description: Afghan women speak out against compulsory male chaperones and new mandate to wear all-covering veils.

title: Her father went to prison - so she went to law school
description: Her father's incarceration on non-violent drug crimes inspired Teeanna Brisco to go to law school.

title: 'I searched for my sister for 30 years, but Covid took her from me'
description: As a child Steve Ellis uncovered a family secret, 60 years later it led to an unexpected friendship.

title: Australia election 2022: Are Australia's refugee releases an election ploy?
description: As refugees detained for years are abruptly released, some think the upcoming election is the reason.

title: Nova Scotia shooting: First-hand accounts heard in probe of Canada tragedy
description: A probe into Canada's worst mass shooting has revealed new details about killer and police response.

title: Eurovision 2022: Highlights of Ukraine's winning night
description: Ukraine won the Eurovision song contest 2022, with the UK coming second, its best result since 1998.

title: Fleeing Syria 10 years on: 'We cried all the way to Jordan'
description: A family looks back after a decade living in the world's largest Syrian refugee camp.

title: Violence at Al Jazeera journalist's funeral procession
description: Police with riot gear hit mourners, saying they were pelted with stones, as crowds carry her coffin.

title: Custom-made brace helps heal baby giraffe
description: Vets in San Diego, California, came up with a creative solution to treat a young calf's limb disorder.

title: The Ukrainian refugee schoolgirl learning fast in the UK
description: Ukrainian refugee Marharyta, nine, is learning English as she waits to start school in Manchester.
